optical_surface.comment: internal optics, assumed 7 optical surfaces of 0.982 = 0.982^7
number of channel surfaces and temp http://ircamera.as.arizona.edu/MIRI/instrument.htm and internal transmission exponent

slit_width.comment: Size of slit image in units of detector pixels

dispersion.comment: Dispersion law. Val is the reference pixel, i.e. the centre of the array, based on Kendrew 2015

wfno_x.comment: based on https://jwst-docs.stsci.edu/display/JTI/MIRI+Observing+Modes says LRS has 2.6 pix @ 7.7 Î¼m giving f = 8.28

osf.comment: Oversample each detector pixel by this amount. Need to be changed

qe_rms_matrix_file.comment: [Default 'None'] Path to CSV file containing matrix of QE of pixels.

Idc.comment: baseline array Rieke et al 2015 PASP https://iopscience.iop.org/article/10.1086/682257/pdf and https://jwst-docs.stsci.edu/mid-infrared-instrument/miri-instrumentation/miri-detector-overview

sigma_ro.comment: Detector readout noise in 14 e-rms based on Rieke 2015 converted Fowler-8 sampling Var_fowler = Var_ro 2/N

full_well.comment: 250000 from Rieke et al 2015 PASP https://iopscience.iop.org/article/10.1086/682257/pdf and https://jwst-docs.stsci.edu/mid-infrared-instrument/miri-instrumentation/miri-detector-overview 193655 from pandexo online

t_g.comment: change name to group time integration time of a single group https://jwst-docs.stsci.edu/display/JTI/MIRI+Detector+Subarrays

pc_fw.comment: maximum percent of full well to which any pixel can reach

nGND.comment: duration of reset event in units of frame time

nNDR0.comment: Integration time of zeroth NDR in units of frame time

nRST.comment: Time lapse between last NDR and reset in units of frame time
